name: Conway's Game of Life
description: Cellular automaton on a 31x4 toroidal grid with four preset patterns

name: Hangman
description: Word-guessing game with 100 ROT13-encoded hidden words and 7 lives

name: Blackjack
description: Classic card game — hit or stand to beat the dealer without going over 21

name: Yahtzee
description: Classic dice game — roll, keep, and score across 13 categories for the highest total

name: Hunt the Wumpus
description: Classic cave adventure — navigate 20 caves, avoid pits and bats, slay the Wumpus
